about.label: Sobre
about.value: Com 10 anos de experiência no mercado de desenvolvimento de software, trabalhei em uma variedade de projetos, desde a construção de plataformas de eCommerce até o desenvolvimento de sistemas para gestão da cadeia de suprimentos, finanças e RH. Meu trabalho sempre foi focado em criar soluções práticas que atendam às necessidades do negócio, utilizando minhas habilidades para melhorar a eficiência e entregar resultados em diversos setores.

values.name: Laravel - Restful API with Passport Authentication
Web Design for Beginners: Real World Coding in HTML & CSS

values.description: Através do meu trabalho, eu aprimoro a qualidade de vida de crianças excepcionais ao aumentar a conscientização sobre suas necessidades e desafios únicos. Nas Associações de Pais e Amigos de Crianças Excepcionais, contribuo para construir uma rede de apoio para famílias que enfrentam desafios semelhantes, promovendo força, conhecimento compartilhado e incentivo.

values.intitution: UniCatólica – Centro Universitário Católica do Tocantins

bullets.first: Construí uma base sólida em Programação Orientada a Objetos (POO), o que me levou a ser contratado como desenvolvedor web profissional antes mesmo de me formar.
bullets.second: Adquiri experiência prática desenvolvendo aplicações desktop, aplicações web, aplicativos móveis e jogos, o que aprimorou minha capacidade de trabalhar com uma variedade de tecnologias.
bullets.third: Aprendi a transitar de forma fluida entre diferentes stacks de tecnologia, graças à diversidade de projetos enfrentados ao longo do curso, preparando-me para uma carreira versátil em desenvolvimento de software.

description.first: Developed internal software using Node.js and React.js in a dockerized environment, which reduced the time needed to process medical reports by 30% and ensured compliance with Medicare standards.
description.second: I automated daily tasks efficiently using Python scripts to process PDF files.

description.first: Led a Proof of Concept (POC) to redesign the PETCO PupBox website, transitioning from a poorly designed system to a robust platform by rebuilding it from scratch using Node.js, Next.js, and TypeScript in a dockerized environment, resulting in a scalable and maintainable solution.
description.second: Ensured ADA compliance on the PupBox website by implementing accessibility features during the redesign process, which improved the user experience for customers with disabilities and aligned the site with legal standards.
description.third: Enhanced API performance by applying Domain-Driven Design, unit testing, and data caching techniques, resulting in faster response times and a more maintainable codebase that could be easily managed by other developers.

description.first: Developed a service platform using Laravel and JavaScript to quickly bring Optime Rotas’ vehicle routingcalculator, originally written in C, to market, enabling the company to offer their routing services online.
description.second: Integrated Google Maps API into the platform, allowing users to visualize routes and track vehicles in real-time, which enhanced the platform’s functionality and improved user experience.
description.third: Streamlined the backend processes by leveraging Laravel to connect the C-based routing calculator with the new web platform, ensuring seamless data flow and efficient route calculations, leading to faster and more reliable service delivery.

description.first: Developed new features and enhanced existing ones for multiple projects within the wine industry using Laravel and Vue.js, ensuring the software remained efficient and aligned with industry best practices
description.second: Integrated Google Maps API into the platform, allowing users to visualize routes and track vehicles in real-time, which enhanced the platform’s functionality and improved user experience.
description.third: Collaborated across teams to integrate new technologies and refine existing code, using Laravel for backenddevelopment and Vue.js for frontend improvements, which contributed to the continuous improvement and success of various wine industry projects.

description.first: SaaS Product Restructuring: Overhauled the SaaS product following the MVC model using the Laravel framework, ensuring alignment with official documentation and industry best practices.
description.second: API Development: Led a strategic shift towards API development to serve larger clients, directly influencing the company’s long-term vision.
description.third: Technical Leadership: Actively participated in key technical and business decisions, collaborating with investors, clients, and the board of directors.
description.forth: Recruitment: Designed and assessed technical exams for the company's first IT team expansion, ensuring the hiring of high-caliber candidates.

description.first: Financial Solutions Development: Created advanced solutions for the financial market using .NET Core 2.0 and Angular 6.
description.second: Frontend Expertise: Gained practical experience with Angular 6 as a frontend framework, enhancing the user interface of web applications.
description.third: Team Collaboration: Worked closely with a small development team to generate and implement innovative ideas for web applications.
description.forth: Content Contribution: Wrote and published technical articles on the company's blog, sharing insights and knowledge with a broader audience.
description.fifth: Architectural Discussions: Actively participated in discussions on architectural and business process decisions, contributing to the overall strategy.

description.first: Application Management: Maintained, enhanced, and supported over 50 web applications stored on the company’s Git server, using a variety of technologies.
description.second: Focused Management: Managed about 10 applications, primarily using ASP.NET, with some in PHP.
description.third: Database Collaboration: Worked closely with a DBA to make technical decisions for SQL Server and MySQL databases.
description.forth: Product Development: Actively participated in product cycle meetings, contributing to discussions on new features and improvements.
description.fifth: User Engagement: Presented new features to users, ensuring they were informed and trained on updates.
